news.title: Brian Wilson, co-creator of iconic 1960s band The Beach Boys, dies aged 82
news.summary: His songs including Surfin' USA, California Girls and God Only Knows have become pop music classics.

news.title: Police deploy more officers after Ballymena 'mob violence'
news.summary: This comes after two days of violence, in which 32 officers were injured and six people arrested.

news.title: How a peaceful protest descended into hate-filled violence
news.summary: Why did a peaceful protest in a County Antrim town end up in two nights of attacks on police?

news.title: UK agrees post-Brexit deal over Gibraltar
news.summary: Talks on rules governing the border of Spain and Gibraltar have been ongoing since Britain left the EU.

news.title: Bomb attack plans found at Austria gunman's home
news.summary: Police say they also found a non-functional pipe bomb and a "farewell letter" during a search.

news.title: Video shows crowds in Gaza scale fence to rush for aid
news.summary: Palestinians can be seen climbing over fences and running to get humanitarian aid in the footage.

news.title: First view of the Sun's south pole filmed by spacecraft
news.summary: Never before seen pictures will help scientists learn how the Sun's activity changes from stormy to quiet periods

news.title: Child Q strip-search officer admits failings
news.summary: One of the police officers who carried out the search tells a hearing it should not have happened.

news.title: First heat-health alerts issued for 2025 while storms bring flood risk
news.summary: Lightning, hail, gusty winds and flash flooding are likely to affect parts of the UK over the next few days.

news.title: WhatsApp tells BBC it backs Apple in legal row with UK over user data
news.summary: The messaging app says the UK government's demands over data access could set a "dangerous precedent."
